GCSupportedGameControllers.description: Specifies the types of game controllers allowed or required for your app. See GCSupportedGameControllers for details.

GCSupportsMultipleMicroGamepads.description: Specifies that the physical Apple TV Remote and the Apple TV Remote app should operate as separate game controllers. See GCSupportsMultipleMicroGamepads for details.

GKGameCenterBadgingDisabled.description: Specifies whether your app is badged. See GKGameCenterBadgingDisabled for details.

GKShowChallengeBanners.description: Specifies whether banners are shown within an app. See GKShowChallengeBannersfor details.

NETestAppMapping.description: Enables testing of per-app VPN app extensions without using an MDM server. See NETestAppMapping for details.

Privacy - NFC Reader Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to use the device’s NFC reader. See NFCReaderUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Media Library Usage Descriptio.description: Specifies the reason for your app to use the media library. See NSAppleMusicUsageDescription for details.

Scriptable.description: Specifies whether AppleScript is enabled. See NSAppleScriptEnabled for details.

NSAppTransportSecurity.description: Specifies changes to the default strong security for HTTP connections in iOS and macOS apps and app extensions. See NSAppTransportSecurity for details.

Privacy - Bluetooth Peripheral Usage Des.description: Specifies the reason for your app to use Bluetooth. See NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Calendars Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s calendars. See NSCalendarsUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Camera Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the device’s camera. See NSCameraUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Contacts Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s contacts. See NSContactsUsageDescription for details.

Dock Tile Plugin path.description: Specifies the name of app’s Dock tile plug-in, if present. See NSDockTilePlugIn for details.

Privacy - Face ID Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to use Face ID. See NSFaceIDUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Health Share Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to read the user’s health data. See NSHealthShareUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Health Update Usage Descriptio.description: Specifies the reason for your app to make changes to the user’s health data. See NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - HomeKit Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s HomeKit configuration data. See NSHomeKitUsageDescription for details.

Copyright (human-readable).description: (Localizable) Specifies the copyright notice for the bundle. See NSHumanReadableCopyright for details. This key replaces the obsolete CFBundleGetInfoString key.

Cocoa Java application.description: Specifies whether the program requires a running Java VM. See NSJavaNeeded for details.

Java classpaths.description: An array of paths to classes whose components are preceded by NSJavaRoot. See NSJavaPath for details.

Java root directory.description: The root directory containing the java classes. See NSJavaRoot for details.

Privacy - Location Always Usage Descript.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s location information at all times. See NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Des.prefix: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description
Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Des.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s location information while your app is in use. See NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription for details.

Main nib file base name.description: The name of an app’s main nib file. See NSMainNibFile for details.

Privacy - Microphone Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access any of the device’s microphones. See NSMicrophoneUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Motion Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the device’s accelerometer. See NSMotionUsageDescription for details.

Core Data persistent store type.description: The type of Core Data persistent store associated with a persistent document type. See NSPersistentStoreTypeKey for details.

Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage.prefix: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage.description: Specifies the reason for your app to get write-only access to the user’s photo library. See NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription for details.

Privacy - Photo Library Usage Descriptio.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s photo library. See NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription for details.

Preference Pane icon file.description: The name of an image file resource used to represent a preference pane in the System Preferences app. See NSPrefPaneIconFile for details.

Preference Pane icon label.description: The name of a preference pane displayed beneath the preference pane icon in the System Preferences app. See NSPrefPaneIconLabel for details.

Principal class.description: The name of the bundle’s main class. See NSPrincipalClass for details.

Privacy - Reminders Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s reminders. See NSRemindersUsageDescription for details.

Services.description: An array of dictionaries specifying the services provided by an app. See NSServices for details.

NSSiriUsageDescription.description: Specifies the reason for your app to send user data to Siri. See NSSiriUsageDescription for details.

NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription.description: Specifies the reason for your app to send user data to Apple’s speech recognition servers. See NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription for details.

NSSupportsAutomaticTermination.description: Specifies whether the app may be killed to reclaim memory. See NSSupportsAutomaticTermination for details.

NSSupportsPurgeableLocalStorage.description: Declares that the app can depend on nonlocal storage for user data. See NSSupportsPurgeableLocalStorage for details.

NSSupportsSuddenTermination.description: Specifies whether the app may be killed to allow for faster shut down or log out operations. See NSSupportsSuddenTermination for details.

NSUbiquitousContainerIsDocumentScopePubl.description: Specifies whether the iCloud Drive should share the contents of this container. See NSUbiquitousContainerIsDocumentScopePublic for details.

NSUbiquitousContainerName.description: Specifies the name that the iCloud Drive displays for your container. See NSUbiquitousContainerName for details.

NSUbiquitousContainerSupportedFolderLeve.description: Specifies the maximum number of folder levels inside your container’s Documents directory. See NSUbiquitousContainerSupportedFolderLevels for details.

NSUbiquitousDisplaySet.description: Specifies the mobile document data that the app can view. See NSUbiquitousDisplaySet for details.

NSUserActivityTypes.description: Specifies the user activity types that the app supports. See NSUserActivityTypes for details.

NSUserNotificationAlertStyle.description: Specifies whether the notification style should be banner, alert, or none. The default value is banner, which is the recommended style. See NSUserNotificationAlertStyle for details.

Privacy - TV Provider Usage Description.description: Specifies the reason for your app to access the user’s TV provider account. See NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription for details.

Exported Type UTIs.description: An array of dictionaries specifying the UTI-based types supported (and owned) by the app. See UTExportedTypeDeclarations for details.

Imported Type UTIs.description: An array of dictionaries specifying the UTI-based types supported (but not owned) by the app. See UTImportedTypeDeclarations for details.
